Caption: Figure 3. Shadow model conﬁdence.
Mention:
We project the disparity vectors into the quantized
color space, in which each bin represents a color value
visible in the background. Note that, more than one
disparity vectors may be assigned to each bin since
there may be same color pixels with diﬀerent dispar-
ities in the background. We aggregate disparity vec-
